attributes.action: Change stamp duty so that a buyer pays 1% on the first £250K and 3% of the value in excess of £250K and not 3% on the whole value of the property.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current system is extremely unfair on the basis a property purchased for £250,000 the sum of £2,500 is paid in stamp duty but a property purchased for £260,000 the sum of £7,800 is due in stamp duty. HOW CAN THIS BE REASONABLE. Simply the 3% threshold should only apply to the value in excess of £250,000 therefore for a property purchased for £260,000 stamp duty should be paid at 1% of £250,000 and 3% of £10,000 therefore making the total due £2,800 instead of £7,800.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
